contexts.context: .... In the 19th century Cotton B.V. was <mark>restorated</mark> so that each leaf was mounted on a paper...
...devasted by the Normans and received help for the <mark>restoration</mark> of the Abbey from Fulbert, bishop of Cambrai...
...by paper leaves, and foliated. By the <mark>restoration</mark> of the manuscript in 1985-86 these paper leaves...
...was removed from the manuscript when the binding was <mark>restored</mark> in 1987 and is now stored separately.)
